body_html: By the way. Do you have any idea of the first problem that I want to use another function when passing arguments convolution instead of std::move(convolution)? Because the move will reset the convolution parameter, and I want to retain convolution value. I have tried pass the convolution without std::move, it raise error. :(
body_text: By the way. Do you have any idea of the first problem that I want to use another function when passing arguments convolution instead of std::move(convolution)? Because the move will reset the convolution parameter, and I want to retain convolution value. I have tried pass the convolution without std::move, it raise error. :(
body: By the way. Do you have any idea of the first problem that I want to use another function when passing arguments `convolution` instead of `std::move(convolution)`? Because the `move` will reset the `convolution` parameter, and I want to retain `convolution` value. I have tried pass the `convolution` without `std::move`, it raise error. :(
